landing.welcomeTitle: Canadian workplace speaking — try a quick test first
landing.welcomeDesc: Get started without signing up. A <1>60-second speaking</1> + <2>mini lesson</2> to see where you stand.
landing.languageStepDesc: You can change this anytime in Settings.
landing.howFoundTitle: How did you hear about us?
landing.howFoundDesc: A quick pick helps us tailor your experience.
landing.whyDesc: You can pick more than one. Our app is built for real Canadian workplace speaking.
landing.levelTitle: How confident are you speaking now?
landing.levelDesc: Pick one so we can level you accurately.
landing.dailyGoalDesc: Keep it sustainable. You can change it anytime.
landing.startPointDesc: We recommend a starting point from a short test. Choose <1>Find my level</1> to enable Continue.
landing.miniLessonTitle: Warm up with a mini lesson
landing.miniLessonDesc: Listen then speak a sentence you can use at work in Canada.
landing.miniLessonCallout: You’ll see one sentence at a time (easy → hard), then one phrase at a time to repeat. This warm-up helps us find your level (L0–L8).
landing.listenDesc: Listen, then tap the words in order to build the sentence.
landing.continueUnlock: Continue will unlock when the sentence is correct.
landing.micHint: Tap the mic, then repeat the sentence. (Voice recognition in Chrome and other supported browsers.)
landing.xpCreditsHint: We give XP and credits based on pronunciation, pace, and confidence.
landing.scoreUnlockedDesc: Complete practice to earn XP and credits. Use them in the Store.
landing.streakDesc: Speaking a little every day keeps your mouth moving.
landing.rewardDesc: Hit your goals to earn credits and use them in the Store.
landing.recommendDesc: Based on your goals and level, we recommend a <1>Canadian workplace speaking roadmap</1>.
landing.createProfileDesc: Save your progress and continue with a personalized roadmap.
landing.createProfileCreditsNotice: Create your profile now to receive 100 extra credits.
landing.leaveProfileRewardConfirm: If you leave this screen, you will lose the reward. Are you sure?
landing.countryStepDesc: We'll tailor content to your region.
landing.occupationStepDesc: Select a category, then your job. Canadian workplace focus.
landing.doesThisApply: Does the statement below apply to you?
landing.improveTitle: Which part do you want to improve?
landing.improveDesc: Select at least one. We'll tailor your practice.
landing.vocabSelectTitle: Select all the words you know

statement.listening: I don't understand well when I hear fluent English.
statement.vocabulary: I often get stuck when speaking because I know few words.
statement.grammar: I often make sentences sound awkward when speaking.
statement.production: I understand, but words don't come out well.
statement.natural: I can speak English, but I want to speak more naturally.
statement.movies: I don't understand well when watching English movies.

home.sessionsContinueBelow: Sessions continue below (15+). Expand Run/Quick Review/Quest in details.
home.nextOnPathSub: The next session continues below in your path.
home.maintainStreak: Complete 1 session today to maintain your streak.
home.keepStreakRule: Complete 1 session today to keep your streak.
home.levelReasonLong: Recent quest performance above threshold → promotion / below threshold → demotion
home.creditsSub: Use in Store to purchase items/coupons.
home.today1Desc: Learn calm phrases to set boundaries and close the conversation professionally.
home.today2Desc: Practice empathetic replies and de-escalation phrases for busy shifts.
home.today3Desc: Handle exceptions and escalate to a manager with professional language.

practice.title: Practice Hub
practice.subtitle: Level {{level}} · Personalized daily plan
practice.studySettingsIntro: Session-level preferences. For notifications, language & voice speed, go to Profile → Settings.
practice.chooseIndustriesDesc: Add 3–5 industries you want to practice most.
practice.autoPickedDays: Auto-picked from your last {{days}} days mistakes · {{layer}}
practice.weakSetInfo: There are 42 question items selected by AI from the preposition problems you frequently got wrong in the last 90 days.
practice.unlockTestAreaDesc: Unlock in Store to choose your exam, see your plan, and view your roadmap.
practice.refreshScenarios: Show other scenarios for your industries
practice.weakHint_w3: Could/Would + softeners (would you mind… / if possible…).
practice.weakHint_w4: Time/location phrases under speed are inconsistent.
practice.weakHint_w5: Tense selection gets shaky in storytelling.

store.title: Store
store.subtitle: Use credits to buy instant, session, or permanent items.
store.subtitleShort: Use credits to boost your practice.
store.intro: Use credits for one-time, session, or permanent upgrades.
store.howItWorks: How it works: Choose an item → Buy. Credits are deducted. Use once: Ready, Session: uses left, Unlock forever: Owned.
store.typeTooltipInstant: Apply once right after purchase. Shows as Ready until you use it.
store.typeTooltipSession: Use a limited number of times per session. Uses reset when the session ends.
store.typeTooltipPermanent: One-time purchase. You own it forever (no use limit).
store.item_instant_streak_shield_desc: Your streak won't break if you miss today. Applied once on purchase.
store.item_instant_fast_review_desc: Turns your 5 most-missed expressions into an instant review set.
store.item_instant_focus_mode_desc: Locks today's goal in focus mode. Applied once on purchase.
store.item_session_practice_plus_5_desc: Adds follow-up questions and instant feedback when you run a session.
store.item_session_practice_plus_1m_desc: Unlocks Practice+ features for 1 month (time-based access).
store.item_session_roleplay_pro_3_desc: Higher difficulty roleplay and tougher situation branches.
store.item_session_review_boost_7_desc: Richer summary, alternatives, and report after the session.
store.item_perm_cafe_track_desc: Unlocks the Cafe work roadmap in Roadmap. Learn service flow, complaints, rush hour.
store.item_perm_medical_sim_desc: Adds the Medical Simulation module to Practice permanently. Unlocks Medical roadmap.
store.item_perm_interview_master_desc: Adds the Interview Master module to Practice permanently. Unlocks Interview roadmap.
store.item_perm_report_filters_desc: Expands date and filter options in Stats/Reports.
store.item_perm_test_area_desc: Unlocks the Test prep area in Practice: choose exam, see your plan, and view your exam roadmap.

reportDetail.summary: Good policy framing. Add more empathy before constraints.
reportDetail.toneClarityTip: Empathy first → one clear next step → alternatives.
reportDetail.noteWrittenOnly: Note: written answers only (no pronunciation/audio engine).
reportDetail.tone1: Tone is professional and calm overall.
reportDetail.tone2: Good de-escalation language when the customer threatens to complain.
reportDetail.clarity1: Options are clear, but add a short empathy line before stating constraints.
reportDetail.clarity2: State the single next step first, then alternatives.
reportDetail.nextStepDesc: Repeat the 'no receipt' branch until you can respond in 1–2 calm sentences with empathy first.

profile.title: Profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your progress and purchases.
profile.characterHint: Your character appears in the bottom-left rail thumbnail.
profile.reportsDesc: View quest and test reports, scores, and feedback.
profile.statsDesc: Accuracy, pace, vocabulary, and activity over time.
profile.myAccessDesc: Purchased items, session boosts, and permanent unlocks.

profileAccess.intro: Purchased items and unlocks. In the full product these apply automatically in Practice.
profileAccess.streakShieldDesc: Your streak won't break if you miss a session today.
profileAccess.practicePlusDesc: Adds follow-up questions and instant feedback when you run a session.
profileAccess.medicalSimDesc: Opens the Medical Simulation module in Practice permanently.
profileAccess.noPurchases: No purchases yet. Buy items with credits in the Store.
profileAccess.demoNote: * Demo UI only. Store purchases will sync here in a later build.

settings.title: Settings
settings.intro: Manage notifications, language, and privacy. Changes are saved automatically.
settings.notifDesc: Choose how we get in touch.
settings.pushNotifTimeDesc: We'll send a push at this time when enabled.
settings.privacyDesc: Your profile streak, credits, XP, and profile photo are visible to other users.
settings.voiceSpeedDesc: Applies to all lessons and speaking exercises.
settings.targetLevelDesc: Your long-term goal level. CEFR levels are mapped to our service levels (L0–L18) below.
settings.targetLevelA1: A1 (L0–L2) — Beginner: basic expressions and daily phrases
settings.targetLevelB1: B1 (L6–L8) — Intermediate: familiar topics, main points
settings.targetLevelB2: B2 (L9–L11) — Upper intermediate: standard speech, detailed text
settings.targetLevelC1: C1 (L12–L14) — Advanced: fluent, wide range of language
settings.targetLevelC2: C2 (L15–L18) — Proficient: near-native understanding and expression

reports.title: Reports
reports.openReport: Filter and open your full report details
reports.retentionPolicyText: Reports are retained for <1>up to 1 year</1>. Older reports are removed automatically.

roadmap.subtitle: Full learning route for Stage 1–8. Current position:
roadmap.nextGoal: Next goal: complete Stage {{stage}} · Unit {{unit}} → move to next unit/stage

dialog.confirmDeleteMessage: All your data will be permanently deleted. Are you sure?
dialog.confirmLogout: Are you sure you want to sign out?

login.title: Log in
login.demoAccountHint: Account you can use to log in (1)

signup.title: Create your profile
signup.nicknameDuplicate: This nickname is already in use.
signup.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.
signup.cropHint: Drag to move · Scroll to zoom
